Hi, I’m Waruna Wickramasingha

				developing scalable, high-performance, mission-critical, fault-tolerant, and distributed systems.  My work experience spans multiple domains, including scientific computing, 
				artificial intelligence, agentic AI, capital markets, cloud computing, banking, medical systems, and telecommunications, each with its own constraints, risks, and trade-offs.
